The origin of the claim was traced back: This post mentioned a student named Chris Williams who was shot while protecting fellow students during the Parkland shooting.
Multiple news reports and sources confir: The heroic actions described in the claim were not attributed to any individual named Chris Williams.
The image accompanying the claim was fou: not Chris Williams. The same photograph was also found on other websites, suggesting that it was not specific to the Parkland shooting incident.
The grandmother of the person depicted i: stating that the story was not true. The person in the photograph themselves also confirmed their identity and clarified that their name was not Chris Williams.
